code: var axios=require('axios');export var FETCH_ITINERARIES_REQUEST='FETCH_ITINERARIES_REQUEST';export var FETCH_ITINERARIES_SUCCESS='FETCH_ITINERARIES_SUCCESS';export var FETCH_ITINERARIES_FAILURE='FETCH_ITINERARIES_FAILURE';export var fetchItinerariesRequest=function fetchItinerariesRequest(){return{type:FETCH_ITINERARIES_REQUEST};};export var fetchItinerariesSuccess=function fetchItinerariesSuccess(itineraries){return{type:FETCH_ITINERARIES_SUCCESS,payload:itineraries};};export var fetchItinerariesFailure=function fetchItinerariesFailure(error){return{type:FETCH_ITINERARIES_FAILURE,payload:error};};export var fetchItinerariesList=function fetchItinerariesList(city){return function(dispatch){dispatch(fetchItinerariesRequest());axios.get("https://mern-ubiqum-v2.herokuapp.com/itineraries/".concat(city)).then(function(response){var itineraries=response.data;dispatch(fetchItinerariesSuccess(itineraries));}).catch(function(error){dispatch(fetchItinerariesFailure(error.message));});};};
